item.description:
Hi to All,

Monday May 4, New Horizons in Woburn 7-8:30- wrap up and leave by 9 PM.

This has been a very busy month for me. Probably for many of us. The inventory of available properties in my investment areas is very tight right now. Lots and lots under agreement, few actives. I am busy looking for the next one!

I will bring before and after pictures of both the properties I am doing now. And invite all of you to do the same. Put them on a disc and we can all see them. I will have my laptop and projector with me. I have office 2007, so any office powerpoint format will work.

Jim and I attended Robyn thompson's 5 day bootcamp a week ago. Very good info.

For investors, it is still pretty tight and requires a heavy % of cash in. Money out refis are hard to come by, too. For my property, there were REO restrictions that caused more obstacles and challenges. It's a dance out there, but when we learn the basic steps, it can be done. I will be sharing how it is working for me. I wnet hard money on one, cash on the other one. First sale set for 5/28- going to market next week I hope on the second one.

Let's plan, too, to talk about the real estate market, the impact of the stimulus package, and what projects and plans you are into. I am looking forward to a great conversation!

Warm regards,
Annie
item.how_to_find_us: Come in and go down the stairs to our meeting room on the lower level.
item.name: The Greater Boston Real Estate Investing Club May Meetup
